translation.en: BELLA: It's simple at first.

translation.en: when they were happy.
The kittens had a mother cat.
And I had a mother dog.
I couldn't imagine that life could get any better.
As I grew, we made a home together.

for a while.

that if that dog gets picked up on the street,

Okay. You ready?
And...
Go home.

Go home.

Best game ever!

translation.en: Yes! You did it!
You did Go Home. Well done.
That was impressive. LUCAS: Good job, Bella. (LAUGHS)
Good girl. Wow.
So, now, if we take Bella off the property

I had to have that squirrel.

Bella!
Bella!
Bella!
Bella, I've been looking all over for you.

translation.en: Bad dog.
Bella, you can never, ever do that again.

I'm impounding that animal.

translation.en: Go home, Bella.
Bella, go home.
Go home, Bella. But you need me.

translation.en: Bella.
Bella, please, go home.

translation.en: Bella, please. Go home, Bella.

Easy does it. Bella, go home.

(BELLA WHIMPERING) Don't do that.
OFFICER LEON: Sir. LUCAS: Come on.
OFFICER LEON: Sir, let go, now.

translation.en: You need to let him have the dog.
Not with that on her.
CHUCK: Let go.
Chuck, let him do it.
It's okay, Bella.
It's okay. It's okay. I got you.
Follow me.
It's okay. I got you, baby. It's okay.

translation.en: It's okay.
Bella, I screwed up.

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
All right. BELLA: All of a sudden,
translation.zh: -好吧 -突然间 -我闻到了很多其他狗的气味 -你会没事的

translation.en: I smelled so many other dogs. You're okay. It's all right.

translation.en: I will come get you, Bella. Understand?

Step away.
Please. (WHIMPERING)
Lucas? (WHINING)

In you go.

I did Sit some more.
I did No Barks.
I did Lots of Barks.

Come on.
Hello.
Hang on.
Aw, you don't seem like such a dangerous animal to me, sweet girl, hmm?

translation.en: Come on. Come on.
Hey! Lucas!
Hi. Hi. I'm ready to do Go Home.
Hey. See, I'm here.
I'm here. Well, there's question one.

translation.en: She's obviously your dog.
Good girl. I know. I know. Good girl.

translation.en: All right. There you go.
So, you've paid the fine.
I just need to give you the discharge information.

translation.en: In Denver, all that's required for a dog to be classified as a pit bull
translation.zh: 在丹佛 如果有三位动物管理局的官员 将一条狗鉴定为斗牛犬

translation.en: is for three Animal Control officers to certify that it is.

translation.en: And Bella has been certified pit bull.

translation.en: What does "certified pit" mean?

translation.en: It means if they pick her up again, she'll be euthanized.

translation.en: What? That's the law.
Pit bull's a pretty loose description. It's like saying "hound dog."
translation.zh: 对斗牛犬的定义很宽泛 它们和猎犬一样

translation.en: So, the City Council essentially voted that a dog can be banned from the city

translation.en: because of how it looks.
translation.zh: 决定是否禁止它在城市出现

translation.en: That's basically racism for dogs.
I know. It's stupid.

translation.en: I mean, Bella is the most gentle dog in the world.

translation.en: You should see her at the hospital with the veterans.

translation.en: I mean, they love her.
What about if we move?
Like, Golden or somewhere out of the city limits?
translation.zh: 搬去戈尔登 或者其他不属于城市管辖范围的地方？

translation.en: That works.

translation.en: Meanwhile, do you have someone who can look after her?

translation.en: My aunt and uncle, they live in Farmington.

translation.en: Maybe they could help us. New Mexico?

translation.en: It's like 400 miles.
I'm really ready to do Go Home now.

translation.en: All right, here we go. Got your dinosaur.

translation.en: What else do we have?

We're just happy to help.
Olivia's such a sweetheart.

I'll be in the car.

translation.en: We're all home, now.
Bella, I'm so sorry.
See you soon.

Hey.
Here, I got ya, I got ya.

Backup can't possibly get here fast enough to help you.

Maybe you're just buddies.
Now, you're gonna let my son

Copy?
Copy.
Go on, Bella. That's it.

translation.en: Hey.
You're such a good girl, Bella.

translation.en: I know you won't understand, but I'm not abandoning you.

Why can't I ride in the front with you?

translation.en: LUCAS: Here.
You gotta have your blanket.
Why did he bring my Lucas blanket?

translation.en: It should be on the bed.
I promise, very soon, you'll get to go home.

Please! No!
His scent was fading.
I was getting farther and farther away.
I smelled my Lucas blanket to feel better,

translation.en: but it wasn't Lucas.
Sit.
LORETTA: Bella, come here.
Yes.
Oh, you're so pretty. Yes, you are.

JOSE: Hello?
Hey, how is everything?
Oh, she's fine. Yeah. Really?
Okay. All right. See you tomorrow, then.
Guess what?
They found a nice place in Golden,

translation.en: and they're coming to get you tomorrow.

You're a good dog. But how?

I was supposed to be with Lucas.

translation.en: I had to find a way to get to him.

translation.en: I didn't know what that loud thing was,

translation.en: But I do remember that from Snow Do Your Business.

translation.en: Wait.
Yes!
I'm doing it!
I'm doing Go Home!

But I knew that I was going in the right direction.

translation.en: The feeling now was a pull, like I was on a leash

translation.en: And there were so many strange smells.

It looks like a cat, but it smells like a dog.

It was breakfast time,

translation.en: but I couldn't find a bowl of food anywhere.

translation.en: It's not in a bowl,
but I'll take it.
This breakfast is really fast!
I need breakfast!
This breakfast was harder to hunt than that squirrel.

There are people down there.
A pack.
Maybe I shouldn't bother them.

One Tooth is big.
To be polite, I'll carefully sniff where the other dogs have marked.

Oh, Crazy Hair is in charge.
Thanks.

translation.en: Hey. There you are. (CHUCKLING)
Yeah, today's special. Chicken.
You like that. You like...

translation.en: Okay, very good. That's it. That's it.
You can go now, okay? Go.

translation.en: Coming.
One Tooth was a brave hunter,
who wasn't afraid of anything.
It was exciting to learn to hunt from him.

translation.en: This pack was so much fun. Hello.
translation.zh: -这个小群体很有趣 -你们好呀

translation.en: Hi, sweethearts.
Oh, and who are you? Are you new?
There you go, sweethearts. Yeah.
Please go home now. Go on home now. Go on home.
How did she know I was doing Go Home?
WOMAN: Go home!
BELLA: It was a wonderful day. MAN: Good boy, Sarge.

translation.en: But where's One Tooth going?
All right, in you go. Come on.
And Shaggy Butt, too?
Guess that just leaves you and me, Crazy Hair.

translation.en: Oh, wait.
Everyone in this pack has their own people.

translation.en: (CRAZY HAIR BARKING) BELLA: Crazy Hair wanted me to go with him, to be part of his family.
translation.zh: “乱头发”想让我和他一起回去 加入他的家庭

translation.en: It seemed nice in there, with lots of good smells.

translation.en: I could be happy here.

translation.en: But they didn't need me.
Mom needed me.
Lucas needed me.
And I needed them.
Lucy! There you are.
BELLA: So, I had to keep doing Go Home.
Now, I knew that to hunt I needed to go where there were people
translation.zh: 我知道了 要觅食 就得去有人的地方

translation.en: and do what One Tooth taught me.
translation.zh: 照着“一颗牙”教我的做 （寻狗启示 寻到有酬“贝拉”）

translation.en: BELLA: (SNIFFING) I smelled blood.
It was the largest animal I had ever seen.

translation.en: And something very bad had happened to her.

translation.en: HUNTER 1: Come on! Whoo! Through here.
I see it. Go.
translation.zh: 我看到它了 快过来

translation.en: Thing's gotta be worth a thousand bucks.
translation.zh: 这东西肯定能卖个一千块

translation.en: HUNTER 2: Oh, at least. Beautiful.
translation.zh: 至少一千块 真漂亮

translation.zh: -你觉得它有多重？六十公斤？ -嗯

translation.en: HUNTER 2: Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -你觉得它有多重？六十公斤？ -嗯 -来个自拍吧 -当然了

translation.en: HUNTER 1: Hey, let's get a selfie. HUNTER 2: Yeah, you bet.
HUNTER 1: Okay, ready?
HUNTER 2: Yeah. HUNTER 1: Here.
Wow. She's beautiful. (CAMERA CLICKS)
HUNTER 1: Yeah, that one's going up on the wall. HUNTER 2: Yeah.
translation.zh: -没错 把这皮剥下来挂墙上去 -对

translation.en: BELLA: What is that?
It kind of looks like a cat.
I hoped the cat would leave with me and not get caught by those bad men.
translation.zh: 希望这只猫和我一起走 不要被那些坏人抓到

translation.en: That cat didn't smell like any cat I ever knew.
translation.zh: 那只猫和我认识的猫气味都不一样

translation.en: Was it following me?
Yep, it was following me.
And suddenly, I realized it wasn't a full-grown cat.
translation.zh: 我突然意识到它不是一只成年猫

translation.en: It was still just a kitten.
A really big kitten.
Come on, Big Kitten. This way.
translation.zh: 来吧 大个子小猫咪 这边走

translation.en: That big animal must have been this kitten's mother.
translation.zh: 那只很大的动物肯定是这只小猫咪的妈妈

translation.en: Big Kitten made me think of Mother Dog
translation.zh: 大个头小猫咪让我想起了狗妈妈

translation.en: and how sad I was when she was taken away.
translation.zh: 想起了她被带走时我有多难过

translation.en: She needed someone to take care of her.
Big Kitten's mother couldn't feed her anymore,
translation.zh: 大个子小猫咪的妈妈再也不能给她喂吃的了

translation.en: so, I did.
I was Big Kitten's Mother Cat now.
translation.zh: 我现在是大个子小猫咪的猫妈妈了

translation.en: Big Kitten needed to eat, and so did I.
translation.zh: 大个子小猫咪和我都需要吃东西

translation.en: So, I did what any mother would do.
translation.zh: 所以我做了妈妈们都会做的事

translation.en: I went hunting.
BELLA: Sorry, baby!
Hey! Hey! Drop it!
BELLA: Many nights, Big Kitten would wander off on her own.
translation.zh: 很多个晚上 大个子小猫咪都会自己出去走走

translation.en: I would sleep and dream of home.
translation.zh: 而我就独自睡下 梦到我的家

translation.en: You ready for your tiny piece of cheese?
translation.zh: 要不要吃一小块奶酪呀？

translation.en: Here you go. Good girl. (CHUCKLES)
You're such a good dog, Bella.
translation.zh: 贝拉 你真是只乖狗狗

translation.en: BELLA: As time passed and Big Kitten got bigger,
translation.zh: 随着一天天过去 大个子小猫咪越长越大

translation.en: she still didn't seem to understand how to do Go Home.
translation.zh: 她好像还不知道怎么做“回家”

translation.en: So, when she tried to take me away from it,
translation.zh: 每次她想要把我带去别的地方时

translation.en: I would always have to bring her back.
Whenever Big Kitten went out at night, someone gave her food.

translation.en: Cats love fish,
but I wish someone would give her chicken.

translation.en: We kept each other warm.
We were family now.
I had been smelling something all morning.
translation.zh: 整个上午我都闻到了某种气味

translation.en: Something like dog.
First, I heard them.
translation.zh: 一开始 我听到了声音

translation.en: Then I saw them.
Their eyes were cold.
They were hunting us.
And I had to protect Big Kitten.
translation.zh: 我要保护大个子小猫咪

translation.en: MAN 1: Hey! Get out! Get out of here!
Scram! Get out!
Hey, check it out.
translation.zh: 快看 -那是山猫吗？ -不 它是美洲狮

translation.en: Is that a bobcat? MAN 2: No, no, it's a cougar.
translation.zh: -那是山猫吗？ -不 它是美洲狮

translation.en: It's a young cougar.
BELLA: Big Kitten was afraid of the men.
translation.zh: -大个子小猫咪害怕那些人 -跑得真快

translation.en: MAN 3: Whoa. That's really fast.
translation.zh: -大个子小猫咪害怕那些人 -跑得真快 我想看看他们会不会给我们点吃的

translation.en: BELLA: But I decided to see if they would give us food. (WHINING)
translation.zh: 我想看看他们会不会给我们点吃的

translation.en: Pretty scared to me. (CHUCKLES)

translation.en: There was just one more place to look for Lucas.
translation.zh: 只剩一个地方可以找到卢卡斯

translation.en: MAN: That's good. WOMAN: Later.
MAN: See you. WOMAN: Bye.
Dogs? Yeah, that's a good boy.
BELLA: I used to be the only one.
Um, Olivia? What?
I think a stray dog just came through.
translation.zh: 好像有条迷路的狗闯进来了

translation.en: The alarm goes off, I get up.
translation.zh: 闹钟响起 我起来了

translation.en: I got somewhere to go.
I like the job.
No way.
Can't be.
TEO: Bella? (WHINES)
It is her! Come here! Come here, girl.
translation.zh: 真的是她！快过来！乖狗狗 过来

translation.en: What happened to you, girl?
What? What is it?
No. BELLA: Lucas?
It can't be.
Bella!
BELLA: Lucas, Lucas, Lucas!
translation.zh: 卢卡斯 卢卡斯 卢卡斯！

translation.en: (CHUCKLING) Bella, Bella! You're alive.
translation.zh: 贝拉 贝拉！你还活着

translation.en: I can't believe it.
Bella, where have you been all this time?
translation.zh: 贝拉 这么长时间你都去哪了？

translation.en: Is that Bella? Yeah, it is. It really is.
translation.zh: -是贝拉吗？ -是的 真的是她

translation.en: Bella!
translation.zh: 贝拉！ 天啊 已经两年半了

translation.en: Oh, my God. It's been like two and a half years.
translation.zh: 天啊 已经两年半了

translation.en: Hi. BELLA: Lucas! Olivia! Mom!
I did Go Home!
TERRI: She came home. I know, I know.
translation.zh: -她回家了 -我知道 我知道

translation.en: Can you call the vet, tell him we're on the way?
translation.zh: 你能给兽医打个电话 告诉他我们在过去的路上了吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah. I'll get the car.
translation.zh: -好的 -我去把车开过来 卢卡斯？卢卡斯 外面有个警官让你把狗带出去

translation.en: Lucas? Lucas, there's an officer outside who says you have to bring that dog out.
translation.zh: 卢卡斯？卢卡斯 外面有个警官让你把狗带出去

translation.en: LUCAS: I'm so sorry.
Come on.
You kidding?
All right, everybody.
No big deal. Nothing to worry about.
translation.zh: 不是什么大事 不用担心

translation.en: I'm just here for that pit bull.
translation.zh: 我是为了那条斗牛犬来的

translation.en: And if any of you interfere,
translation.zh: 你们中如果有任何一位干扰我的工作

translation.en: these officers, they will arrest you.
translation.zh: 这些警官都会逮捕你们

translation.en: OFFICER LEON: We don't want any trouble,
but we have to take that animal.
translation.zh: 但我们必须要带走那只动物

translation.en: I thought I'd see why half the department
translation.zh: 我很好奇为什么半个部门的人

translation.en: is out here on a routine Animal Control call.
translation.zh: 接了一个普通的动物管理电话 就都跑过来了

translation.en: Anybody want to fill me in?
translation.zh: 有人愿意给我说明一下吗？

translation.en: Captain, I'm here for a confiscation, and some of these people,
translation.zh: 长官 我只是来扣留那条狗的

translation.en: they're trying to turn it into some kind of a situation.
translation.zh: 这些人不配合工作 想把事情闹大

translation.en: It's obstruction, harboring a dangerous animal,
translation.zh: 这是妨碍公务 豢养危险动物

translation.en: and disobeying a lawful order.
Well, which one of you is responsible for this crime spree?
translation.zh: 你们之中谁要为这一系列违法行为负责？

translation.en: I thought it might be something like that.
That a pit bull?
Doesn't look like a pit bull to me.
She's my dog, sir, and she's hurt.
translation.zh: 她是我的狗 长官 她受伤了

translation.en: I'm taking her to the vet.
translation.zh: 我正要带她去看兽医 我很抱歉要告诉你 查克说得没错

translation.en: Well, I'm sorry to tell you that Chuck's right.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉要告诉你 查克说得没错

translation.en: We have to take your dog in to the shelter.
translation.zh: 我们必须要带你的狗去收留所

translation.en: TEO: All right.
But to do so, you've got to go through
translation.zh: 如果你要这么做 就必须要先通过 美国海军陆战队第三海军师第一营队

translation.en: the 1st Battalion, 3rd Marine Division, United States Marine Corps.
translation.zh: 美国海军陆战队第三海军师第一营队

translation.en: 1st Infantry, Army.
82nd Airborne Division, U.S. Army.
translation.zh: 美国陆军第八十二伞兵师

translation.en: 6th Fleet, United States Navy.
101st Airborne, Screaming Eagles.
translation.zh: 猎鹰中队第一零一伞兵师

translation.en: 4th Infantry Division, United States Army.
You really want this thing to escalate?
translation.zh: 你们真的想把事情闹大吗？

translation.en: Do you?
Ma'am, my job is to enforce the law,
translation.zh: 女士 我的职责是执行法律

translation.en: and the law says I've got to impound this dog.
translation.zh: 法律要求我必须扣留这条狗

translation.en: Now, if that means Tasers and pepper spray,
translation.zh: 如果需要动用到电击器和胡椒喷雾

translation.en: then that's what it means.
translation.zh: 那我是不会手下留情的

translation.en: Under Denver city ordinance 8-...
translation.zh: 根据丹佛市政法令第八条

translation.en: Wait.
He said "Denver."
TERRI: That's right.
But this isn't Denver.
This is federal property. It's what?
The VA Hospital is federal property.
translation.zh: 退伍军人医院是联邦政府的财产

translation.en: It isn't technically a part of the City of Denver.
translation.zh: 严格来说 这里不属于丹佛市

translation.en: So, that's it, Captain.
translation.zh: 那就只能这样咯 长官 那我们就不用争了 毕竟在这里你们没有执法权

translation.en: There doesn't have to be a fight, 'cause you don't have jurisdiction.
translation.zh: 那我们就不用争了 毕竟在这里你们没有执法权

translation.en: So, where did you two serve?
translation.zh: 那你们两位曾经在哪里服役？

translation.en: Basra. Kabul.
Hue, Tet Offensive.
translation.zh: 越南顺化 春节攻势

translation.en: All right. Show's over. Let's pack it up.
translation.zh: 好了 闹剧结束 收拾收拾回去吧

translation.en: MAN: Yeah. (LAUGHS)
If I see this dog leave the premises, I will pull your car over.
translation.zh: 我要是看到这条狗出了这里 我就把你们的车给拦下

translation.en: No, you won't.
Chuck, I get more complaints about you
translation.zh: 查克 我收到的对你的投诉

translation.en: than all the other ACOs combined.
translation.zh: 比整个管理局的人加起来都多

translation.en: Turn that vehicle in. I'm pulling you out of the field.
translation.zh: 把车交回局里 你以后不用出外勤了

translation.en: And nobody is pulling anyone over for a dog.
translation.zh: 任何人都不允许因为一条狗就拦下别人的车

translation.en: Got it?
Good.
Oh, my gosh, Bella, we missed you so much.
translation.zh: 天啊 贝拉 我们好想你

translation.en: BELLA: I don't understand what just happened,
translation.zh: 我不明白刚刚发生了什么

translation.en: but I'm pretty sure it was good.
translation.zh: 但我敢肯定那是件好事

translation.en: Oh, look what I found in the chest.
translation.zh: 看我在箱子里找到了什么

translation.en: I totally forgot.
Come here. Remember this, Bella?
BELLA: My Lucas blanket!
I wanted to try something. OLIVIA: Yeah.
This was her favorite thing when she was little.
But after all she's been through, I don't know if she'll remember.
translation.zh: 她经历了这么多 不知道还记不记得

translation.en: Bella, do you want...
A tiny piece of cheese. ...a tiny piece of cheese?
She does remember.
OLIVIA: She's an amazing dog.
translation.zh: 她真是条不可思议的狗狗

translation.en: She really is.
BELLA: I was really home
with Lucas, and Olivia, too.
translation.zh: 和卢卡斯、奥利维亚在一起

translation.en: I was where I needed to be.
translation.zh: 我终于回到了我应该在的地方

translation.en: BELLA: And Big Kitten was where she needed to be.
translation.zh: 大个子小猫咪也生活在她应该在的地方

translation.en: BELLA: I finally understood
that the invisible leash that led me to Lucas
translation.zh: 那条牵引着我回到卢卡斯身边的看不见的绳索

translation.en: was made of love.
He was my person.
And I was his dog.
